ComicInfo.Title: Salt of My Tears; Alan Moore's Songbook: Trampling Tokyo; T.O.M. Foolery; My Rottenest Christmas Ever!; Classics Desecrated: Good King Hop-A-Long; Seasons Change; Lost Laughter Chapter Seven: Please Exit Carefully; Mr. Mamoulian: Hush-Hush
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:03:07. [Issue ID 327931]
ComicInfo.Summary: Song of Godzilla tiring of trampling Tokyo.
